stix:STIX_Header.stix:Title: Phishing Email Attempt with Apple Account Theme
stix:STIX_Header.stix:Description: On 25 September 2014 an energy sector organization received a phishing email that contained a malicious URL. The URL attempts to lure the recipient with a notice to verify an email address for an Apple account.

stix:Indicator.indicator:Description:
The following is the email that was received: --------------BEGIN EMAIL HEADER----------------- Received: from pps.filterd ([REDACTED] [127.0.0.1]) by [REDACTED] (8.14.5/8.14.5) with SMTP id s8P2NA03016844 for <[REDACTED]>; Wed, 24 Sep 2014 21:23:10 -0500 Received: from ssh.ispadmin.eu (ssh.ispadmin.eu [95.173.193.40]) by [REDACTED] with ESMTP id 1pkxdjbyk2-1 for <[REDACTED]>; Wed, 24 Sep 2014 21:23:09 -0500 Received: from sentinel.net-service.cz (sentinel.net-service.cz [95.173.193.60]) by ssh.ispadmin.eu (Postfix) with ESMTP id 26A5EAD5BB for <[REDACTED]>; Thu, 25 Sep 2014 04:50:11 +0200 (CEST) Received: from localhost (localhost.localdomain [127.0.0.1]) by sentinel.net-service.cz (Postfix) with ESMTP id A7584192380AB for <[REDACTED]>; Thu, 25 Sep 2014 04:22:41 +0200 (CEST) X-Virus-Scanned: Debian amavisd-new at xen-etch Received: from sentinel.net-service.cz ([127.0.0.1]) by localhost (sentinel.net-service.cz [127.0.0.1]) (amavisd-new, port 10024) with ESMTP id 0X5925e5j8Ii for <[REDACTED]>; Thu, 25 Sep 2014 04:22:41 +0200 (CEST) Received: by sentinel.net-service.cz (Postfix, from userid 1005) id BD656192350DD; Thu, 25 Sep 2014 04:22:30 +0200 (CEST) To: [REDACTED] Subject: =?UTF-8?Q?You_have_a_problem_with_your_Apple_account=2c?= Date: Thu, 25 Sep 2014 04:22:30 +0200 From: =?UTF-8?Q?Apple_Service?= Message-ID: <4bd6254265dd92ae58d601b088062d2b@www.wt-pro.eu> X-Priority: 3 MIME-Version: 1.0 Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable X-Proofpoint-Virus-Version: vendor=fsecure engine=2.50.10432:5.12.52,1.0.28,0.0.0 000 definitions=2014-09-25_02:2014-09-25,2014-09-25,1970-01-01 signatures=0 X-Proofpoint-Spam-Details: rule=notspam policy=default score=0 spamscore=0 suspec tscore=41 phishscore=28 adultscore=0 bulkscore=0 classifier=spam adjust=0 reason=mlx scancount=1 engine=7.0.1-1402240000 definitions=main-1409250026 Content-Type: text/html; charset="windows-1252" --------------END EMAIL HEADER----------------- --------------BEGIN EMAIL BODY----------------- Itunes Connect This is an EXTERNAL email. STOP. T= HINK before you CLICK links or OPEN attachments.

Dear client ,

You have a problem with your Apple account,

=20

We just need to verify that this e-mail address belongs to you.

=20

Simply click the link below and login using "Apple ID" and your passwor= d.

Verify Now

For more information, see Questions and answers.


Thank you,

The Apple customer support.

Copyright =A9 2014 Apple Inc. All rights rese= rved. | Privacy Policy
=20=20=20=20 . --------------END EMAIL BODY-----------------

The URL directs the victim to a non-Apple destination. Other activity from the second-level domain gulfup.com, specifically im45.gulfup.com, has been seen and captured in past reporting.
The domain im45.gulfup.com was reported as a callback domain in IB-14-10132.
The URL also directs the victim to a non-Apple destination. The third-level domain of the URL is hosted at IP address 204.45.61.36.
The URL also directs the victim to a non-Apple destination. The third-level domain of the URL is hosted at IP address 74.220.215.225.
